    Recon Village 2017

    An Open Space with Talks, Live Demos, Workshops, Discussions, CTFs with a common focus on Reconnaissance.

    Recon Village (DEFCON 25) Schedule

    We had a super heavy dose of OSINT in DEF CON 25, Vegas and we were able to record the talks as well. All the recorded talks can be watched on DEFCON 25’s Recon Village Youtube Playlist
